/usr/local/ompi-x/bin/mpicxx  -fopenmp -rdynamic "CMakeFiles/intra-node-performance-test.dir/intra-node-performance-test.cpp.o" -o ../build/test/intra-node-performance-test   -L/usr/local/glex/include  -L/vol8/home/nudtgcy/PJT-WorkDir/numactl-master/build/lib  -L/vol8/home/nudtgcy/PJT-WorkDir/numactl-master/build/include  -L/mnt/share/pjt/GLEX_Coll_lib/IntCompresser  -L/mnt/share/pjt/GLEX_Coll_lib/build/lib  -L/usr/local/glex/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/glex/include:/vol8/home/nudtgcy/PJT-WorkDir/numactl-master/build/lib:/vol8/home/nudtgcy/PJT-WorkDir/numactl-master/build/include:/mnt/share/pjt/GLEX_Coll_lib/IntCompresser:/mnt/share/pjt/GLEX_Coll_lib/build/lib:/usr/local/glex/lib -lglexcoll -lglex -lm -lrt -lstdc++ -lrt -lglex -lrt -lm -lstdc++
